website_summaries.verdict: A good option for anyone wanting a middle-ground fuel filter that is better than budget options.
pros: Provides general filtration performance in most cars, trucks, and SUVs
Will last longer than budget fuel filters but is still more wallet-friendly than more premium options available
cons: The fuel filter may need replacing after a bad fuel batch

customer_reviews.title: Bait and switch!!! Buyer beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bait and switch!!! the item I received was not an AC Delco filter, it was an aftermarket FIF brand (never heard of them) Buyer beware!!!
customer_reviews.author: dennis

customer_reviews.title: Feels like I got ripped
customer_reviews.text: This shows a genuine AC Delco filter but what I received was an FJF brand. Box looked so similar That I didn't even notice until I was ready to install. Even used the GM part number. Had to go get another filter since it's not worth taking a chance on something I know nothing about. Feels like I got ripped.
customer_reviews.author: JoLisa Lantz

customer_reviews.title: The filter showed up with some kind of manufacturing flaw ...
customer_reviews.text: The filter showed up with some kind of manufacturing flaw which allowed it to leak diesel and draw in air. Spent a week trying to fix this issue and ended up purchasing another Wix filter to replace it. Box ended up in the trash with the the filter that was on the truck before I put this defective one on so I cannot return it...
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Perry

customer_reviews.title: It is OEM
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant when purchasing this product that it was going to Original Equipment but it was. I came with 2 o-rings, one for the top to seal the filter to the housing and one for the bottom to seal the drain plug. I would recommend this product from this vendor. I think i will purchase another one at this price to have it on hand when i need to replace the filter again.
customer_reviews.author: Wendie Hale Moran

customer_reviews.title: OEM parts are the best
customer_reviews.text: The price on this was phenomenal! I just had to get it because it was an OEM part. It's a bitch getting it in and out without removing the whole fender well. I ordered the access door off of another website. When it's time to change it again, it should be a snap. Go with OEM! I ordered a couple of different adapters off of Amazon and they don't work well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Schirf

customer_reviews.title: Fits just as OE
customer_reviews.text: Never had a problem with the Delco filters and just wish they were not so pricey. Always carry a spare and that price is easy to justify when you get a clogged filter during travels. Don't leave home without it. TIP: Add a small set of washers and longer screws behind the filter mount to give you a little room to get your fingers around these filters.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: I have checked several brand name auto part stores and the cheapest was $47.00 didn't dare check the GMC dealership they are always marked up. It was delivered right on time , it had the replacement O ring, perfect condition and it fit perfectly.....I'll be back
customer_reviews.author: Denny Boy

customer_reviews.title: perfect, this is the new upgrade model
customer_reviews.text: perfect,this is the new upgrade model, old is TP 3012
customer_reviews.author: Hazel Bungor

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: I have put over 20 fuel filters on my truck. Never had a problem with not one fuel filters. I bought this cheap filter from Amazon and my truck would not stay running, air was getting in the system. I think either the threads were not right and the gasket had some problems, would not keep the air out. All I can say is I replace the ACDelco filter And now I have no problem with my truck. But Amazon did make it right and give me my money back after I explain to them what was going on. Thank you Amazon for understanding
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Bait and Switch on this item
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was ordering a OEM filter and I received a knock off brand. "FPF" Buyer Beware !!! This is going straight to the trash. Now I need to run into town to get a real filter.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen S Romero

customer_reviews.title: Don't be fooled like I was
customer_reviews.text: I thought the Cat filter was the best around because I listened to other people without doing research myself. I have recently discovered that Cat 1R0750 filters 98% efficiency @4 micron, Baldwin BF9882 filters 99.85% @4 micron and AC Delco TP3018 filters 99.9% @4 micron. I'm sticking with AC Delco.
customer_reviews.author: Ldiddy

customer_reviews.title: Easier than expected
customer_reviews.text: Finally got the nerve to change my own fuel filter on my Chevy Silverado 2500HD. I usually pay the dealer as I've been stranded with fuel filter problems after letting someone else change it once. After watching YouTube videos I felt that it's not that hard. It's not. Anyone can do it. Don't remember who it was but the bleeder screw discussion... try Matt McDonald or Thoroughbred Diesel. Very simple and saves $60 over the dealer cost.
customer_reviews.author: RangerLee

customer_reviews.title: If it's good enough for OEM
customer_reviews.text: This filter is made for my truck. Others seem to have gone to a plastic shell. I've tried the plastic body filters and had difficulty with air leaking into the fuel system. I'll just stick with the ACDelco. If it's good enough for OEM, it is good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: BillB

customer_reviews.title: This is why GM is struggling
customer_reviews.text: Instead of using a simple screw on filter, this is GM's idea of a better idea and then charge 10 times the price of a normal filter. Then they tuck it under the battery and a cross member to make it easier to change. The filter is a fine replacement for the truck, I am just complaining about the design.
customer_reviews.author: TJH Fiddler

customer_reviews.title: Fuel filter.
customer_reviews.text: just twist off the old and twist on the new. Can’t get much easier than that. Mileage?? It is a set interval... really amazon. If you didn’t know that then don’t ask to rate the intervals.
customer_reviews.author: MRC

customer_reviews.title: OEM Filter
customer_reviews.text: AC DELCO TP3018 is the ONLY filter to use on a Duramax Diesel. In the Duramax Forum Fuel Filter Shootout, it won hands down, with the exception of 2 others that were somewhat marginal. All the others failed including the WIX (NAPA) and especially FIJF made in China. Injectors are expensive and the fuel filter is not the place to cut corners.
customer_reviews.author: Judi Misner

customer_reviews.title: Broke while putting it on
customer_reviews.text: Plastic insides broke free from metal housing when I was putting it on. Had to disassemble it to get it off. Bought a couple of months ago so I can't return it. Will have to deal with the manufacturer. Wrenched for over 30 years, never had this happen.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoor4

customer_reviews.title: Leaks air and caused a lot of frustration
customer_reviews.text: defective filter that draws air into the fuel causing me to get foam out of the bleeder nut. I took it out and put it back on three times, changed some questionable fuel lines,and still got foam out of the bleeder nut. I put the old filter back on and it works fine. I am returning this item and getting a Fram filter that matches the one on there.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Vandal

customer_reviews.title: Reliable Fuel filter with quality parts with solid reliability
customer_reviews.text: I have been using AC Delco Fuel Filters on my 2006 Duramax since 2007. I have also used 3 other brands only to find out that they leak and I end up wasting money and replace the Filter with an OEM AC Delco. AC Delco packs the o-rings flat in the box. Other brands pack their o-rings inside of the filter housing which distorts the o-ring which increases the chance of the o-ring to shift on installation and cause fuel leaks. I like the reliability of AC Delco Fuel Filters and will continue to only use the OEM Filter.
customer_reviews.author: david flores

customer_reviews.title: have to use oem
customer_reviews.text: tried an off brand for the first time in 12 years...to save money. One month later my truck was going into limp mode constantly. Trouble code was low fuel rail pressure. Put an oem filter back on...the problem immediately went away, and has not come back as of 2 months later
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: ACDelco TP3018 Professional Fuel Filter with Seals
customer_reviews.text: Delivered fast and as expected and no problems with delivery. O anothepened the filter box to be surprised that the plastic seal around the filter and rubber seals were obviously ripped open and then stuffed back in to the ripped plastic bags. The filter looked and smelled new, but I wonder if Amazon inspected this product before sending it to me.
customer_reviews.author: Modell

customer_reviews.title: GOOD AC DELCO JUST LIKE IT SAYS, with both O'Rings
customer_reviews.text: Came it just like it says, AC DELCO and had both O'Rings all sealed up in the box. Don't know what more you could ask for. Glad I ordered it!.!.! Will order again when I need too.
customer_reviews.author: Darv R.

customer_reviews.title: Beware shoppers
customer_reviews.text: Beware shoppers, I didn’t receive an AC delco fuel filter as shown in item picture or description, you might get a IFJF knock off like I Received.
customer_reviews.author: Farm Truck Texas

customer_reviews.title: Great price for OEM filter
customer_reviews.text: OEM filter at non dealer price, I paid roughly half what the dealer wanted. If you're not mechanically inclined it can be a PITA to install and re-prime the fuel system, at least on a Duramax, but can absolutely be done with a little patience.
customer_reviews.author: aruba1018

customer_reviews.title: Assembled in USA
customer_reviews.text: The off brand filter at the parts store was made in Taiwan. This AC Delco has “assembled in the USA on the side. Installing the new one is time consuming on my 2016 Silverado Duramax because it requires removing the air box, wheel/tire and the wheel housing.
customer_reviews.author: buyamerican

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great filter fits my 2015 chevy 2500 duramax diesel perfect. Easy change.the top gasket is a little tricky but i hold it on with permatex gasket sealer a little before i install it but thats just me .its not necessary if u have patient's..... hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: J Demo

customer_reviews.title: not too bad of a rating especially with my AirDog 165-4G installed ...
customer_reviews.text: TP3018 is the right filter for any Duramax truck and supercedes the TP3012. Quality filter built by Racor and at 4 microns, not too bad of a rating especially with my AirDog 165-4G installed with Donaldson filters before it. Protect your CP4.2 LML guys!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Scott Averbuck

customer_reviews.title: Right price, easy install.
customer_reviews.text: The price is right and finding one with a metal exterior was impossible at local shops. The interior does haveplastic, but this is the OEM brand and part. The install is simple too. Shipping was fast as well.
customer_reviews.author: EROK

customer_reviews.title: Great oem filter and price.
customer_reviews.text: 2004 2500 HD. Great OEM filter. This was very easy to change. 30 min job taking your time. Tools required, flathead screwdriver to remove inner fender, and a filter wrench. Replace it every other oil change.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great Replacement
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement for my 2003 Silverado 2500HD (Duramax). I usually go to the local parts store and get one of the off-the-shelf brands, but this was half the price and its AC Delco.
customer_reviews.author: G. James

customer_reviews.title: Great filter but hard to put on
customer_reviews.text: Filter was as advertised AC Delco tp3018 same one that was in my truck. As some have stated it is very hard to put on from the top the old one came off and goes back on easy from the top not sure what’s going on. I had to go through the fender-well to put my on and then it went right on.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2004 Chevy Silverado w/Duramax (LLY)
customer_reviews.text: This part is just the filter, not the water sensor and wiring/plug. The filter is a perfect fit, works fine. I ordered a sensor separately, which attaches to the bottom of the filter.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: OE Quality at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I use these AC Delco fuel filters for three of my Duramax diesel trucks. I use OE filters when possible as it takes the guess work out of my already hectic fleet maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben_C

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Oem quality filters last as long a the quality of fuel allows last one was changed over 10000 miles of use and had 49% life left but changed at annual interval
customer_reviews.author: anthony beck

customer_reviews.title: AC Delco
customer_reviews.text: Part arrived undamaged, haven't installed yet, I decided I wanted to replace the water sensor along with the filter, cheap insurance to prevent possible damage on a very expensive motor.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt B.

customer_reviews.title: OEM quality for good price
customer_reviews.text: I got the AC Delco filter new in the box as advertised. Works great although installing these is not a small job. Glad it is available.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes it pays to stick with OEM parts
customer_reviews.text: Actually, I haven't installed this one yet but it's the second one that I've bought and it fits properly, unlike another brand that's made of molded plastic. That one had malformed threads.
customer_reviews.author: Gary G.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for product
customer_reviews.text: this fuel filter was delivered on time and fit my 2005 GMC Sierra Duramax. It was a tough to get the thread started but once I got it on it was easy to install. Easy to prime and bleed.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Rittatore

customer_reviews.title: Great filter
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to install, I always fill the filter with diesel fuel before screwing into the fuel system. I also cut a hole in my inner fender which I made a cover to give easy access and easy cover for the fender cut out. Way cheaper than the $150 filter change at the GM Dealer. Takes about 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: H2OHED

customer_reviews.title: Oem
customer_reviews.text: This is the best price I found and this probably the best filter you can use on your diesel works great at keeping the fuel clean
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: May not be real acdelco
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know if I got a faulty filter or a aceelco knock off. The filter wouldn’t seal then it wouldn’t come off it had stripped on the inside. It took 3 hrs to get it back off. I have changed these over 20 times and never had this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Green

customer_reviews.title: If you have a Chevy use AC Delco, it makes a differance.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried 2 other brands of fuel filters and had problems with getting a code "change fuel filter" (I have a Chevy), a friend suggested getting a AC Delco some times Chevys can be sensitive, didn't have much hope, but it did work, must be a flow or a volume thing.
customer_reviews.author: thomas

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: Never have had an issue with ac delco fuel filters, unit I purchased one of these. Filter was spinning inside of housing so could not tighten and water indicator was stuck in bottom and had to carefully cut out. Bought 2 and the second one was fine, so just be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie P.

customer_reviews.title: Fuel Filer
customer_reviews.text: Great fuel filter replacement in an 06 Duramax. Been using these for years. Way cheaper than local auto parts stores.
customer_reviews.author: Mike F

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in everyway
customer_reviews.text: I wish every job I did on my truck was this easy. Everything fit perfect and was VERY easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Axfiles

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to check the thread!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these over the last few years and all have been good. This one came with a defective thread and would not screw onto the truck. I had to reinstall the old one till I can get a new one. Be sure to check the thread before installing.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Krause

customer_reviews.title: Great oem replacement
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and i like OEM. No issues. Will buy every year as needed. Used for 2007.5 duramax
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OEM awesome.
customer_reviews.text: They have great quality and work fantastic. They don't really have the low microns that we really need in a diesel engine but they work great for a backup filter or redundant.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Sweat

customer_reviews.title: 6.6 duramax
customer_reviews.text: All parts were there including new gaskets I change my fuel filter every 8000 and had no problems with this filter 2016 6.6 duramax
customer_reviews.author: joseph

customer_reviews.title: works very good
customer_reviews.text: So I put this in myself with the help of my boyfriend. What they dont tell you is there is a cover in the center that you need to remove or it wont fit properly. Other than that, it came just as it said it would with 2 rings.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be real deal
customer_reviews.text: Best I can see without cutting it open it appears to be the real deal complete with orings.
customer_reviews.author: QWERTY

customer_reviews.title: Will always use
customer_reviews.text: Have installed several of these over the past 5 years and have not had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff H

customer_reviews.title: Like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Buy true parts like this. Don’t be fooled by the cheap made in China knock off parts... they don’t fit.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than any auto parts store
customer_reviews.text: If you are a Duramax owner. Keeping your fuel filter fresh is a must! Replace at least every 10k
customer_reviews.author: Luis Bajo

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It works great for what it does and it being a metal filter beats the hell out of the cheap plastic ones in my book.
customer_reviews.author: dmckinleym

customer_reviews.title: great all around purchase
customer_reviews.text: local auto parts chain stores couldn't compare in price for the same filter. Fitment was great
customer_reviews.author: Taylor White

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing how deceitful these are actually made
customer_reviews.text: Cut one of these apart after in clogged in just 3 weeks. It's amazing how deceitful these are actually made. The canister looks great, and big, the element is 4" long and 3" in diameter.....WOW.....shame on them. Converted to a regular Cummins filter, no problems.
customer_reviews.author: cavey

customer_reviews.title: Don't know if it was just the one I got ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't know if it was just the one I got but i could not get it to thread on, I bought a carquest one and it went on right away
customer_reviews.author: Josh Grisham

customer_reviews.title: Best Filter for the Duramax
customer_reviews.text: These AC Delco filters are 1/3 the price of local and are the same as the original for my Duramax. I bought spares and it was great to get them so cheap with free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: S. Holland

customer_reviews.title: Awesome !!
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Blows the parts store filters right out of the water. Best filter to use on ur Duramax. Fit perfectly on my 2011 Chevy 2500
customer_reviews.author: led slingr

customer_reviews.title: Received correct filter
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned by all the reviews stating they got a filter other than Acdelco but I took a chance and got a legit OEM filter
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Lattice

customer_reviews.title: Quality factory
customer_reviews.text: Great Factory part that install the easy and functions perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Ronin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality OEM replacement
customer_reviews.text: OEM replacement for 2003 duramax! Change it with every oil change and save your injectors!
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood

customer_reviews.title: Good fuel filter
customer_reviews.text: Got this because dealer wanted $200 to change it. Looks good to me
customer_reviews.author: clay hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great for lbz duramax fuel filter
customer_reviews.text: If you own a duramaz lbz you need this. Get it, works great. Includes new o ring. Simple to replace this fuel filter after removing the fender trim.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Savage

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT FIT MY 2012 DURAMAX
customer_reviews.text: THIS FILTER WILL NOT SCREW ONTO MY 2012 2500HD. FILTER LOOKS PHYSICALLY DIFFERENT FROM THE NAPA GOLD FILTER THAT I USUALLY RUN. NEVER HAD ANY PROBLEMS WITH THE NAPA GOLD FILTER OTHER THAN THE PRICE GOING UP. GOING TO BITE THE BULLET AND GO BACK TO WHAT WORKS AND FITS.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Factory AC Delco quality part for Chevy LB7
customer_reviews.text: Original AC Delco part at a great price point. Simple item for a DIY and save $100 in the process. The fuel filter came wrapped in original box with both new gaskets inside wrapped as well. I will not trust my older LB7 injectors to any fuel filter but AC Delco
customer_reviews.author: botterdaughter

customer_reviews.title: Will Order Again!!!
customer_reviews.text: Good fit. Like the metal housing. New filters seem to be going to plastic and I have had to be very careful not to cross thread and at 35-40 bucks a pop that sucks .........
customer_reviews.author: Chas.

customer_reviews.title: could have been used with bad fuel. not good
customer_reviews.text: it said used, I didn't think it would be sold after it was filled with diesel. it should have never be sold. could have been used with bad fuel. not good!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: It's a filter works fine it's an AC and a great price
customer_reviews.author: marc sirevaag

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The second one of these I have used. Last one I put in lasted a year on the button before change light came on.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: TRUE AC DELCO TP3018 was recieved.
customer_reviews.text: Recieved a true Ac Delco fuel filter. Despite other mixed reviews of people getting off brand fif, I went ahead and ordered. Got exactly what's pictured, half tempted to order another at that price for later down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor W.

customer_reviews.title: My go too
customer_reviews.text: What is there to say great product true acdelco and fraction of the dealer costs
customer_reviews.author: Rich M

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love it Fits 2013 lml Don’t forget to buy the metal bleeder screw
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: These are the real deal.
customer_reviews.text: Work great and much less expensive than from a parts store or a GM dealership.
customer_reviews.author: rca

customer_reviews.title: OEM IS THE WAY TO GO
customer_reviews.text: bought this filter and the OEM water separator. Great price and well worth it. Comes with new gasket
customer_reviews.author: P.J.

customer_reviews.title: Fit and functionality
customer_reviews.text: Great price on this AC Delco TP3018 fuel filter. It was installed and fit perfectly on my 2005 Chevrolet Siverado 3500 with the 6.6 duramax engine.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Woods

customer_reviews.title: Good filter, bad seal.
customer_reviews.text: The filter worked well but the o'ring seal did not. I had to reuse the o'ring from the old filter that was replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Bronson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great so far. time will tell as to durabilty.
customer_reviews.author: Auther L. Stanley

customer_reviews.title: 2011 2500HD Duramax
customer_reviews.text: I use this filter on my Duramax. It works great and performs better than other filters I have used. Great price for a fuel filter and nice that it includes all the seals needed. Will purchase again, especially with a great price like it is listed for.
customer_reviews.author: Matt McFadden

customer_reviews.title: What’s to say is AC Delco direct GM replacement can’t go wrong
customer_reviews.text: I always use AC Delco in my Duramax can’t miss
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Just what the Duramax needs. Buy two
customer_reviews.text: It original, It's far less priced than purchasing from a Dealer.. Get one or even two. you know you will need them
customer_reviews.author: GpnmoabTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Knock Off, not an AC Delco fuel filter.
customer_reviews.text: I believe these are not genuine AC Delco fuel filters, but instead Chinese knock offs. The build or design is nothing like the AC Delco filter I removed. I would not recommend ordering these from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Mike J.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described and great price
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly as described, I was weary because of a couple reviews I read but I got exactly what I ordered and installed it with zero problems
customer_reviews.author: andrew dewalt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit just as you would expect from AC Delco. Make sure you check compatibility with your truck/engine. I have a 2007 Chevrolet 2500 with aa 6.6 Duramax
customer_reviews.author: Scott G. Tomkinson

customer_reviews.title: Different part number
customer_reviews.text: Received a different part number than I ordered. After some research I found that a/c delco changed the filter a little. So I put it on my truck.
customer_reviews.author: James Melerine

customer_reviews.title: OEM parts
customer_reviews.text: OEM replacement part at a great price will keep your warrantee in place
customer_reviews.author: Dabotts

customer_reviews.title: Accurate description and very affordable
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the right price and fast delivery would definitely recommend this to everyone who owns a truck like mine and very easy to replace five stars plus!!
customer_reviews.author: Juan Francisco Solis

customer_reviews.title: Great product, exactly as described/advertised. Real Delco product!
customer_reviews.text: Despite the ratings of the vendor supplying something other than Delco was wrong and glad I gave it a try, savings is unbelievable!
customer_reviews.author: CainOhana

customer_reviews.title: Quality filter.
customer_reviews.text: Works great if it fits your truck. I replace my own fuel filters and these have been a quality product over the last 10-12 years and my Duramax's.
customer_reviews.author: John Dunham

customer_reviews.title: Best for Duramax
customer_reviews.text: If you have a Duramax don't use aftermarket truck runs better and filter last 3 times as long
customer_reviews.author: woodpile331

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Not a good purchase. Bought in conjunction with a WIF sensor. When i recieved the filter the top O-ring was loose and beyond usable. Had to run to the local store and purchase another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Saucier

customer_reviews.title: The filter to use with your duramax
customer_reviews.text: If you haven't bought the cat filter upgrade, then this is your best choice. Baldwin is the other acceptable filter, but hard to beat the factory engineered filter to give your injectors a fair shot at long life.
customer_reviews.author: Jon B Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Missing O-rings
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with o-rings.. didn't notice until after I installed and it leaked. Had to replace with new filter.
customer_reviews.author: MelAmi SimVan

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than buying from the dealership
customer_reviews.text: Genuine AC Delco fuel filters for my Duramax Diesel at a price less than the cost at the dealership.
customer_reviews.author: Donovan

customer_reviews.title: perfet fit
customer_reviews.text: good price, and fits our 05 GMC and 03 Silverado
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Kelso

customer_reviews.title: Engineers put this in place, why change it?
customer_reviews.text: Great filter I only used this on my truck. A lot of other brands were going to plastic bodies ACDelco is still using the metal one. OEM at a reasonable price on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: R.C.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great filter but hard to put on due to its diameter. But it's factory.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time factory replacement part. Fit perfect and functions as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Syd

customer_reviews.title: No complaints.
customer_reviews.text: Installed on Chevy 2015 3500hd. After a few thousand miles, no issues... stock up.
customer_reviews.author: BIG TAUR

product_meta.title: ACDelco TP3018 Professional Fuel Filter with Seals
product_meta.description: An ACDelco Professional, premium aftermarket Fuel Filter is the ideal high quality replacement for many vehicles on the road today. It traps fuel contaminants before they enter the engine's fuel delivery system. The fuel filter is located in the fuel line of your vehicle and prevents contaminants, such as dirt, rust, and paint particles from entering the fuel delivery system to keep the engine running properly. This premium aftermarket replacement fuel filter is manufactured to meet or exceed your expectations for fit, form, and function.
feature_bullets: Protects your vehicle’s fuel system from contaminants, such as: dirt, rust, and paint particles
Traps contaminants before they enter the fuel delivery system for improved engine performance
Provides the performance and dependability you expect from ACDelco
Manufactured to meet expectations for fit, form, and function
